title: 5 Low Pop Old Judges (PSA 3/4/5) in Small Traditions Auction
author: darookie723

posts.post_title: 5 Low Pop Old Judges (PSA 3/4/5) in Small Traditions Auction
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

I'm relatively new to this board and haven't posted much, but I enjoy reading daily.  I have a few Old Judges in the current Small Traditions auction (ending Satuday, 1/4) so just wanted to share here in the event some of you are interested.

Otto Shomberg (Catch, Hands Cap High) PSA 5--only 1 graded higher
[url]http://www.smalltraditions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=10041[/url]

Mike Dorgan (Bat Ready, Nearly Vertical) PSA 5 (MC) Rare Pose--Population of 1
[url]http://www.smalltraditions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=10039[/url]

Jerry Denny (Jacket, Arms at Side) PSA 4 (MC)
[url]http://www.smalltraditions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=10040[/url]

Egyption Healey (Pitch. Hands at Chest) PSA 5--only 1 graded higher
[url]http://www.smalltraditions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=10042[/url]

Emmett Seery (Catch Hands Above Head) PSA 3--only 1 graded higher
[url]http://www.smalltraditions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=10043[/url]

Thanks!
Mike
